lead_paragraph: Argentina and neighboring Uruguay will bid to co-host the 2030 World Cup, Argentine President Mauricio Macri said at a joint news conference on Thursday with Uruguayan leader Tabare Vazquez.

headline.print_headline: Argentina, Uruguay Want to Co-Host 2030 World Cup
headline.main: Argentina, Uruguay Want to Co-Host 2030 World Cup

snippet: Argentina and neighboring Uruguay will bid to co-host the 2030 World Cup, Argentine President Mauricio Macri said at a joint news conference on Thursday with Uruguayan leader Tabare Vazquez....
